channel.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
channel.description:
This isn't exactly 'server help' but for some reason mopar's status page doesn't update or show that my server is online anymore.. and my Downtime keeps going lower and lower even though my server is online.
P.S. Don't comment saying it isn't online when I know for a fact it is.

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

What’s the IP Address of the server?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:543089”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=661967.msg4426959#msg4426959 date=1401302196]

This isn’t exactly ‘server help’ but for some reason mopar’s status page doesn’t update or show that my server is online anymore… and my Downtime keeps going lower and lower even though my server is online.

P.S.
Don’t comment saying it isn’t online when I know for a fact it is.

Other status checkers just check to see if the port is open, I do that, but also blacklist some protocols. If you are running FTP, HTTP, SMTP, POP or a few others, I detect that, and since it’s not a private server I mark you as offline. My guess is that is your problem?

Tbh I don’t even know what FTP, HTTP, SMTP, POP are…except for Http…How do I know if I’m running then?
[/quote]

Basically whatever port you put on the server status page actually has to be a runescape private server, not a web server or something else.[/quote]
Let e re-iterate this… this has worked before and has always worked before… My server has never had any problems being ran through port 5555, that’s why I’m saying it has to be an error on your side… Check the Elite Owner’s board as well as many other topics… I AM NOT THE ONLY PERSON WITH THIS PROBLEM
If my server goes below 40% it will be removed from the status page and I will find your neighborhood and shoot it up.
Fix this. I have no clue why this is so difficult for you guys. Besides I posted this thread weeks ago… and I’m still getting responses that have already been told to me… also that don’t help at all.

Threatening to harm isn’t cool. You’re not helping yourself. -John

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:13, topic:543089”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=661967.msg4426918#msg4426918 date=1401280652]

This isn’t exactly ‘server help’ but for some reason mopar’s status page doesn’t update or show that my server is online anymore… and my Downtime keeps going lower and lower even though my server is online.

P.S.
Don’t comment saying it isn’t online when I know for a fact it is.

Other status checkers just check to see if the port is open, I do that, but also blacklist some protocols. If you are running FTP, HTTP, SMTP, POP or a few others, I detect that, and since it’s not a private server I mark you as offline. My guess is that is your problem?
[/quote]
Tbh I don’t even know what FTP, HTTP, SMTP, POP are…except for Http…How do I know if I’m running then?[/quote]

Basically whatever port you put on the server status page actually has to be a runescape private server, not a web server or something else.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:10, topic:543089”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=661967.msg4426351#msg4426351 date=1401043636]

If this is the case, I would send a PM to Moparisthebest too.

No FUCKING STAFF can help? LIke seriously if my server status gets kicked off the status list i’mma go ape shit.

No admins answer their PMs so what’s next?
[/quote]
I appreciate the help everyone and just to be clear I took all of your advice and nothing worked…just waiting on a staff member to answer.
Again, I appreciate all the help and positive comments even when mine may have not been positive.
You can also jump onto IRC and highlight a staff member to address this issue.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t know if the system is how it used to be, but you used to have to register an account for the service status checker to login/out of and that’s how it determined whether it was online or not. This may not be the case, but it was back when I used to host and such.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

[quote=“arean, post:4, topic:543089”]Did you change your ip your server is hosted on? And is it different from the one on the status page? Also the port? Is the port the same too? Because ik you can have 43594,5555, and 43595 if I remember. And go on canyouseeme.org and see if its accessible.

Also idk if this is against the rules but on Runelocus they have a server status checker, type your server ip and port from the moparscape status page to see if its just moparscape.[/quote]
I’m not new to RSPS… I’ve been apart of the RSPS community going on 9 years now…
I used RL’s status checker (with the correct ports) and that’s how I know it’s online…as well as a few others determining factors…

Anyways the problem is MOPAR’s Status Page is the issue here… Every other RSPS status page show my server as ONLINE, whereas Mopar’s is not. So hopefully a staff member, preferably an admin can take care of this.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @arean arean
item.description:
@arean wrote:

Did you change your ip your server is hosted on? And is it different from the one on the status page? Also the port? Is the port the same too? Because ik you can have 43594,5555, and 43595 if I remember. And go on canyouseeme.org and see if its accessible.

Also idk if this is against the rules but on Runelocus they have a server status checker, type your server ip and port from the moparscape status page to see if its just moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Page OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

arean:

It takes atleast 10 minutes for it to update itself. Your server must’ve been down in some way, or is just not playable. Are you able to get on? And if so is others able too? If it is up (which I doubt it) you just have to wait it out.

Yes, yes, yes, and yes…Yet, I’ve been ‘waiting it out’ for about a week now…That’s why I brought my efforts to the forums.

Read full topic
